show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: Leaner Lifestyle
content:
Host Ellen Kamhi, PhD RN, www.naturalnurse.com interviews Lisa Lynn. <!--more--> Lisa has devoted 25 years of practice to the fields of personal training and health and wellness, and is a one-of-a-kind expert in metabolic weight loss and performance nutrition.
Her education includes four certificates from the International Sports and Sciences Association (ISSA) including Certified Fitness Trainer, Specialist in Performance Nutrition, Fitness Therapy and Elite Trainer from The Professional Division of ISSA.
She has spent years of research in metabolic boosting and performance nutrition, and created the Leaner Lifestyle Series as a way of life specifically designed to promote healthy fat loss by boosting even the most sluggish metabolisms.
Best known for her 13 years as personal trainer of Martha Stewart who said, “Lisa is the only trainer that made a difference,” Lisa is also a regular nutrition and fitness expert on The Dr Oz Show and is frequently called upon by major media outlets for her expertise.
Lisa maintains a diverse portfolio of clients including professional body-builders, models, actors, CEO’s and real-world people from across the country.
Contact: www.lisalynnfitness.com
